entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Kakabeka Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:03 p.m. EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High zero.

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 1.
